title: Actor Donnie Yen receives honorary doctorate, recognising contributions to cinema, martial arts and culture
desc: Hong Kong action star and director Donnie Yen has been conferred an honorary Doctor of Humanities by Lingnan University on Monday (Jan 26).

title: US Fed Meeting 2026 LIVE: Dow, Nasdaq end higher after Jerome Powell-led FOMC keeps interest rates unchanged

title: Zaldy Co hiding in Sweden
desc: According to the apostille attached to his petition before the Supreme Court, it showed that the former lawmaker personally appeared before a Swedish notary public, who verified his identity and witnessed the signing of legal documents connected to the petition.

title: Amazon layoffs: Internal messages reveal what Amazon HR head's email 'didn't give details of'
